channel.title: Projects on Paul Cutler
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Paul Cutler

item.title: Silver Saucer
item.description: A web application built with the Pyramid web framework and Python that interfaces with the Discogs API to interact with my music collection.

item.title: MLBPool2
item.description: A fantasy baseball like application written in Python and built with Pyramid to track and report MLB season pool picks and points for league play.

item.title: NFLPool
item.description: A fantasy football like application written in Python and built with Pyramid to track and report NFL season pool picks and points for league play.

item.title: Stone Open
item.description: The website for the annual Stone Open charity golf tournament.
